name: Defective (itch) (DenzilG)
description:
Made for Wowie Game Jam2 with help from Kinga Wojcik.

Theme : "Intentional Bugs"

Interpretation: Enemies slow down the more that are on screen. So its worth not shooting too many at a time.  Try running as much as you can to begin with .

The audio assets are not made by us.

Controls: WASD to move, Left Click to shoot and Right click to Dash.

Our second game Jam, thanks for having a look

update: 

-added WebGL version

-marked file as windows
